text: Va cun [Alloh taolo] nacotason medihad, ʙa nohaq dar zamin sarkasi [va sitam] mekunand. Ej mardum, sarkasi [va sitami] sumo tanho ʙa zijoni xudaton ast, [caro ki faqat] ʙahrai [nocize az] zindagii dunjo [meʙared va] sipas ʙozgastaton ʙa suji Mo xohad ʙud,on goh sumoro az onci mekarded, ʙoxaʙar mesozem
